short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opkey Token Request allows user to fetch access token for 'Authorization Code' and 'Implicit' grant types for 'OAuth2' type.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opkey Token Request is a plugin which allows user to fetch access token for 'Authorization Code' and 'Implicit' grant types for 'OAuth2' type authentication type. Following modules in Opkey utilizes the plugin service: 1. Token Management 2. Service Repository
